sentences.english: The youngster immediately fell silent as tears welled up in his big blue eyes.
sentences.chinese: 小男孩馬上不吭聲了，藍色的大眼睛裏湧滿了淚水。

sentences.english: Sikes turned angrily towards the old man. The re was a silence.
sentences.chinese: 賽克斯生氣地轉向老頭，誰也不吭聲了。

sentences.english: He gave her a sidelong glance with his pale, blue eyes, but did not reply.
sentences.chinese: 他用淡藍色的眼睛瞟了她一下，沒有吭聲。

sentences.english: His funny act kept us laughing all the time, but he kept his mouth shut.
sentences.chinese: 他的滑稽表演讓我們一直笑個不停，但他一直不吭聲。

sentences.english: An old old lights, next to silent at the time silent.
sentences.chinese: 一盞黃黃舊舊的燈，時間在旁悶不吭聲。

sentences.english: The dozen gulls by the shoreline came to meet him, none saying a word.
sentences.chinese: 岸邊有十幾只海鷗飛過來迎接他，但誰都沒吭聲。

sentences.english: The Robert smiles to the Gordon and shocks his head and no longer speaks.
sentences.chinese: 羅柏特對高登莞爾一笑，搖了搖頭，不再吭聲。

sentences.english: I did not answer, is still so proud and cold in his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有吭聲，依舊是那樣高傲而冰冷的迎着他的目光。

sentences.english: The man held his peace, the woman spoke no word, the young girl did not even seem to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 那男子住了口，婦人不吭聲，那姑娘也好象不呼吸。

sentences.english: He'll lie low and pretend he knows nothing about it.
sentences.chinese: 他不會不吭聲，假裝什麼也不知道。

sentences.english: For a long time I didn’t hear anything.
Alfred and Mr. Carr waited, but said nothing.
sentences.chinese: 艾爾弗雷德和卡爾先生都等着，誰也不吭聲。

sentences.english: He stammered out a few words and then sat there in silence.
sentences.chinese: 他結巴了幾句話，然後就坐在那不吭聲了。
